QuestData.Title: Shaping Fate
QuestData.Description:
The Jailer's power and malevolence continue to grow. So must our resilience.
Stand amongst your allies, $n. Push back against the darkness that would consume us all.
Together, we will yet prevail.
May the Purpose guide your hand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thwart the Jailer's efforts throughout Korthia and the Maw by completing Covenant Assaults, Daily Quests, looting treasures, slaying rare creatures, and defeating Tormentors of Torghast.
QuestData.RewardText:
The threads of fate weave through you, Maw Walker.
Just as the prophecies foretold.
